title: Courgette brownies
ingredients: ['125ml vegetable oil', '300g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '40g best quality cocoa powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '250g grated courgette', '60g chopped walnuts', 'Icing', '6 tablespoons best quality cocoa powder', '4 tablespoons butter or margarine', '250g icing sugar', '4 tablespoons milk', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
